title.narrative: Emergency Assistance for Persons in Search of International Protection and Community Strengthening in Venezuela - Phase XV

description.narrative: In 2019, the increase of insecurity, violence and human rights violations in Venezuela have hindered the humanitarian actors to provide assistance and protection services in the country, including the communities of Colombian refugees and asylum seekers. The present action contributes to the provision of life-saving emergency assistance and protection for Colombian refugees, asylum seekers, potential Colombian returnees, and vulnerable host communities in target locations. This project focuses on three lines of action, as identified through various assessments and analysis of lessons learned of previous phases of the project, namely: 1) Timely life-saving assistance to improve the living conditions of Colombian refugees, asylum seekers and members of host communities in targeted Venezuelan States; 2) Food security and nutrition of Colombian refugees, asylum seekers and members of host communities in targeted Venezuelan States; and 3) Life-saving information on threats related to trafficking in persons, migrant smuggling and other forms of exploitation and abuse in targeted communities in Venezuela, including Colombian refugees and asylum seekers to increase their awareness about the risks of trafficking in persons.
